body.name: Wireless Microphone Android, Mini Microphone Wireless - 2pcs Wireless Mic Android, Bluetooth Microphone Wireless, Professional Video Recording, Wireless Lavalier Microphone for Android
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 4 hrs 52 mins
features: ENHANCED AUDIO QUALITY. Each wireless microphone boasts 360 sound pickup, pro-level noise reduction, and reverb control. Connect the wireless mic to your phone or PC : USB-A converter included.

PRACTICAL ADD-ONS: 4 silicone mic cases (protect and color-code the lavalier microphone) and 2 windscreen muff cases (superb noise reduction for the wireless lavalier microphone, even out in the wind).
NEVER STOP RECORDING. This is a dependable interview microphone: up to 35-hour battery time (with case; 7 hours per microphone), with charging indication and case battery % indication.

COMPACT, LIGHTWEIGHT, PnP. Each mini mic is 1.8 inches, weighing only 0.3 oz (8.6 g). It’s a Plug-and-Play phone microphone (no apps needed!), and you can charge your phone right through the receiver.
LONGER RANGE, EXTENDED WARRANTY. A perfect clip on microphone for recording vlogs and interviews: 72 ft (22 m) range, real-time sync, no delay. The phone mic comes with a warranty of up to 1 year.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bear Vlog brings to you a set of 2 wireless mics with a focus on audio quality and practicality. Each vlogging microphone is plug-and-play (instant connection, no apps), and the helpful add-ons in the set will allow you to stick to pro-level recording: at any time, any place.

360 Sound Pickup This small microphone is potent: it picks up the sound of human voice fully and clearly with the omnidirectional 360 technology. Noise Reduction Another trick this lav mic does for you to achieve excellent quality of recorded audio is the cancellation of unwanted background sounds. Reverb Control To make the sound well-defined, the lavalier mic controls reverberation, giving your voice more depth or less, depending on your surroundings.

Handy Cases These wireless lavalier microphones come with four multicolor silicone cases that add extra protection and prevent mix-ups. Wind Protection Also added to the interview microphone set are two special furry wind muff cases that protect the quality of recorded sound from the elements. Fit for PC The USB-A converter allows you to connect the USB microphone to your computer: currently, this option is for Android devices only.

The Bear Vlog microphone, wireless and compact, is built specifically for vlogging and interviewing. High-quality lav mics are a must for any content creator, and we made sure that ours will superbly capture your impressions from every adventure!

7-Hour In-Mic Battery On its own, one charged lav microphone can keep running for 7 hours, giving you plenty of time for your vlogs and recordings on the go. 35-Hour In-Case Battery With their charged case, the microphones will run for up to 35 hours. With charge indication built-in, you’ll always see the battery status in %. Compact and Light The handy little lavalier mic weighs only 0.3 oz (8.6 g; less than two sheets of paper!) at a neat size of just 1.8 inches (4.57 cm).

Long Range 72 feet (22 meters): that’s how far the lavalier microphone can be from the receiver with the sound still being properly picked up. No-Delay Sound The 0.02 seconds of latency mean that the phone microphone for video recording produces real-time sync with no delays. Phone Charging Enabled You can still charge your phone with the receiver in it and the mini microphone running, so nothing has to interrupt your vlog recording in progress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Revised rating: Works on my Motorola 5g stylus 2021 with different camera/video app
reviews.reviewText: This was the 3rd mic I tried. None has worked only because (I found out later) the built-in video/camera app on my phone is incompatible with external audio sources. My phone is OTG compatible, but there's nowhere on my phone that takes me to an OTG set up to get this thing to work. So I reached out to BearVlog.As stated above, it didn't work on my phone because the built-in camera./video app wasn't compatible, not because the mics were faulty. The other mics I had, had the same issue. So I researched BingGPT for a solution and got the idea to download another camera/video app. Open Camera. I did so, set the Audio Source setting to External Mic. It worked on the mic I replaced BearVlog with.BearVlog contacted me apologizing for the inconvenience znc offered to send me another mic to test out to see if it would work. i accepted on the condition that if I found out that it still didn't work, I would keep the 3-star rating and send it back, only because they reached out and tried to fix the situation. But if it did work, I'd revise my rating to 5 stars, for the same reason but also that the mic worked with my phone.5 STARS all around! They sent me a mic, I tried it out and it works perfectly. Not only that, but the sound is more clear and superior than what I had on the mic I replaced it with. It's a much better product, even without the box with a magnet opener in which the two mics can be charged. The four rubber/plastic covers are a nice touch to make the mics less prominent in the videos. Also, the fuzzy covers are cool, although I doubt I'll ever need them since I do my videos indoors, but you never know.I haven't even checked the other features (noise cancellation, range, volume control, etc) but just the fact that the company was willing to go the extra mile, and the fact the product sounded great, earns from me 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work great!!
reviews.reviewText: These work great!!! I'm impressed by the recording quality of these wireless microphones. The noise reduction and reverb control are pro-grade. The reverb control lets me adjust my voice depth. They're also plug-and-play, no need for apps. During a stadium Vlog, the battery life amazed me. The included USB-A converter expands recording options on my computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT on-the-go microphones!
reviews.reviewText: LOVE the new bearvlog microphones! Running a podcast on the go is always hard, getting that perfect audio especially with guests! Bearvlog have a fantastic audio sound, easy to clip on, and their charging features are HANDS DOWN the best !! All digital and right where you need it. Takes the guessing right out of how much battery life you have in your accessories! Love these and highly recommend for anyone for exceptional content!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Tested these briefly and found the sound quality to be very good. The case is great, charging the two mics while not in use. Easy to use. However when you plug it into the iPhone you don't know if it gonna work because you get no indication on the phone. The instructions says open your app to use (what app)? Guess they mean whatever you are going to record with not something they have. They do have good recording volume and distance. I set up the phone in one room and took one of the mics two rooms away - about 40' and the recording was great. Only a couple of things take away from a 5-star review. One is minor, the LED on the receiver is on the narrow edge and its very small. it doesn't face you during a recording so you can't see it when you are using it during a recording. A flashing light indicates that the receiver hasn't made a connection with a mic. Once the mic is turned on the tiny RED LED goes on solid. But its only one LED so you don't know if you have both connections active. The biggest issue I have is that the iphone to receiver connection is so short that it doesn't make a connection with the protective case. This is a $1500 iphone. I use it on a gimbal, I don't want to risk dropping and damaging it because this $20 thing won't connect with the case on. This is a Spigen Tough Armor case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use and Clear Audio
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this! Bought it for my husband, he teaches kids self defense and makes videos of his BJJ classes, so easy to use and excellent quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works for Android and PC and new iPhone.Plus the seller has great customer service. Will buy from seller again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Got 2 sets - wouldn't connect and no support
reviews.reviewText: Got first set. Wouldn't connect to my new Samsung A54 phone. Reset all settings to default on phone. Issue not resolved. Tried my wife's phone. Same model and also new. Didn't work. Put receiver back on my phone and tried using the pass-thru charging feature. Still not working. Tried turning on USB debugging. Nope. Downloaded app on play store to verify phone is OTG compatible. It is. Requested a replacement set. Same issue. Sent an email to the vendor via their support address. Days later still no reply. Called Amazon tech support. They didn't know much and tried to get me put through to the vendor again. They said I might hear back in 48 hrs. No thanks. Didn't work. Can't get timely support. Buy at your own risk. I do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked great…..until they didn’t!
reviews.reviewText: These worked great until the iPhone receiver tip broke off. I have had problems with the receivers on others. The lightening plug is just too flimsy. I use my mics a lot vlogging and posting to youtube and these only lasted 5 months. Very disappointed because I really like the sound quality.
